overview:
Marielaina Perrone DDS is a Family and Cosmetic Dentist serving Henderson and Las Vegas, Nevada since the year 2000.

Henderson Dentist Dr. Marielaina Perrone’s advanced training and years of experience translate into greater confidence and convenience for your entire family. You’ll find complete dental expertise, utilizing the latest advancements in family, cosmetic, & implant dentistry, all here under one roof.

We are a full service dental practice that specializes in family, implant, and cosmetic dentistry services, dental implants, TMJ disorder treatment, periodontal treatment, teeth whitening, porcelain crowns and porcelain veneers, and other restorative dental care.

Some people may still be anxious or nervous. If this sounds like you, we have an option called, “sleep dentistry” or conscious sedation. You will be conscious but in a deep state of relaxation and years of dental care can often be accomplished in just one visit.
